name: Sweet Blueberry Tartine
description: A tartine is an elegantly topped, open-faced French sandwich.

ingredients.name: slices of bread
ingredients.additionalInstruction: your choice, cut from a round loaf

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip
ingredients.additionalInstruction: prepared, or Epicure Sweet Dip of your choice

preparation: Place bread on a crisper. Toast for 5 minutes, flipping halfway through.
To assemble, top toasts with sweet dip, a layer of blueberries, and a sprinkle of sweet dip mix.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.
